data: The event Technical Architecture Presentation was organized to provide a detailed overview of microservices architecture, database scaling strategies, and integration patterns.
The event Technical Architecture Presentation covered microservices design and API gateway patterns.
The event Technical Architecture Presentation included a discussion of service discovery strategies using a combination of DNS and client-side discovery for resilience.
The event Technical Architecture Presentation included a discussion of database sharding strategies.
The event Technical Architecture Presentation addressed backup and failover considerations for system resilience.
The event Technical Architecture Presentation provided actionable architectural recommendations for building resilient and scalable enterprise applications.
